Package com.doa.ui

Class DoaUIComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.scene.DoaObject
      • com.doa.ui.DoaUIComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoaButton, DoaUIContainer
    public abstract class DoaUIComponent
extends DoaObject
    DoaUIComponent is the root of the UI component hierarchy. Every UI component have DoaUIComponent as a superclass. All UI components implement the methods of this class. When a UI component gets mutated(have its size, position, velocity changed), its bounds are re-calculated automatically.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 2.3
    Version:
    2.7
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds()
        Conveniency method to retrieve a DoaObject's bounds, added to DoaObject because of how useful it is for collision detection. By default, returns the smallest bounding box for this object.
        Overrides:
        getBounds in class DoaObject
        Returns:
        the bounding shape of DoaObject

      • getParent

        public DoaUIContainer getParent()
        Returns the container that holds this component.
        Returns:
        parent of this component, or null if parent == null;

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Return whether this component is visible or not.
        Returns:
        true if and only if, the component will be ticked and rendered on the next frame

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Return whether this component is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        true if and only if, the component will be able to react to and absorb mouse events.
